# defaultUnixSocket

**Type Property**

The options to use for a default UNIX domain socket.

## Declaration

```swift
static var defaultUnixSocket: VZLinuxRosettaDirectoryShare.CachingOptions { get }
```

## Type properties

- **maximumNameLength**: The maximum length of the name of an abstract socket.
- **maximumPathLength**: The maximum length of the path to a UNIX domain socket.
